Criteria for searching  for a suitable pattern:
• NOR Type: classification scheme, thesauri, lexicon, glossary, or 
folksonomy 
• Data model: C.Scheme (path enumeration, adjacency list, 
snowflake, or flattened), Thesaurus (record-based, relation-based)
• Transformation approach: TBox, ABox, or population
© A Method for Re-engineering Non-Ontological Resources for Building Ontologies 
Boris Villazón-Terrazas, Mari Carmen Suárez Figueroa
speaker: SYSTEM
